Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Syphilitic \Syph`i*lit"ic\, a. [Cf. F. syphilitique.] (Med.) Of or pertaining to syphilis; of the nature of syphilis; affected with syphilis. -- n. A syphilitic patient. [1913 Webster]
syphilitic adj : of or relating to or infected with syphilis; "syphilitic symptoms" n : a person suffering from syphilis
